Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the game board of the game.

  • Method Details

    • hasFree

      public int hasFree(int x, int y)
      Determines how many free sides the single tile on the board has.
      Parameters:
      x - the first axis of the board representing the row of the tile
      y - the second axis of the board representing the column of the tile
      Returns:
      the number of free sides in the range (0 to 4)

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(int x, int y)
      Removes an item from the BoardTile and re-inserts it in the ItemDeck.
      Parameters:
      x - the first axis of the board representing the row of the tile
      y - the second axis of the board representing the column of the tile

    • removeAllItems

      public void removeAllItems()
      Removes all the items from the BoardTile and re-inserts them in the ItemDeck.

    • drawItem

      public Item drawItem(int x, int y)
      Calls the BoardTile class' method to draw the item from the single tile.
      Parameters:
      x - the first axis of the board representing the row of the tile
      y - the second axis of the board representing the column of the tile
      Returns:
      the tile if it is present, null otherwise

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Prints the Board.

    • toRefresh

      public boolean toRefresh()
      Checks whether the game Board must be refreshed or not.
      Returns:
      true if the Board must be refreshed, false otherwise

    • refreshBoard

      public void refreshBoard(Game game)
      Refreshes the game Board by drawing an Item for each valid empty BoardTile.
      Parameters:
      game - the reference to the current Game

    • initializeBoard

      public void initializeBoard(Game game)
      Initializes the game Board by drawing an Item for each valid Board tile.
      Parameters:
      game - the reference to the current Game

    • isFreeNorth

      public boolean isFreeNorth(int i, int j)
      Checks whether the selected board tile is free on the north or not. Note that this method returns true even if the tile doesn't have an item on it.
      Parameters:
      i - the first axis of the board representing the row of the tile
      j - the second axis of the board representing the column of the tile
      Returns:
      true if the north tile is free, false otherwise

    • isFreeSouth

      public boolean isFreeSouth(int i, int j)
      Checks whether the selected board tile is free on the south or not. Note that this method returns true even if the tile doesn't have an item on it.
      Parameters:
      i - the first axis of the board representing the row of the tile
      j - the second axis of the board representing the column of the tile
      Returns:
      true if the south tile is free, false otherwise

    • isFreeEast

      public boolean isFreeEast(int i, int j)
      Checks whether the selected board tile is free on the east or not. Note that this method returns true even if the tile doesn't have an item on it.
      Parameters:
      i - the first axis of the board representing the row of the tile
      j - the second axis of the board representing the column of the tile
      Returns:
      true if the east tile is free, false otherwise

    • isFreeWest

      public boolean isFreeWest(int i, int j)
      Checks whether the selected board tile is free on the west or not. Note that this method returns true even if the tile doesn't have an item on it.
      Parameters:
      i - the first axis of the board representing the row of the tile
      j - the second axis of the board representing the column of the tile
      Returns:
      true if the west tile is free, false otherwise
